entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:25 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -29.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 09:32 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -29.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -32.8°C
Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:20 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:20 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
